author: mrodozov
body:
#### PR description:

Fix this failure due to comparison int vs unsigned
https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/buildlogs/slc7_ppc64le_gcc9/CMSSW_12_0_DBG_X_2021-05-11-1700/RecoPixelVertexing/PixelVertexFinding

#### PR validation:

compiles and run

title: Fix compilation failure in DBG in RecoPixelVertexing/PixelVertexFinding
